channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Adesso Footwear
channel.desc: Adesso is a rapidly growing British design-led brand offering fun and fabulous ladies footwear. If you love colour and want something that little bit different, you'll love Adesso.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Grow Your Own with Suttons
channel.desc: Grow Your Own with Suttons.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Cottage Garden
channel.desc: Join us for an inspirational hour of outdoor living accents as we look at the cottage garden trend. One of grace and charm, dainty petals or cascading flower-filled pots won't look out of place here.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: White Stuff
channel.desc: Discover White Stuff in this show, featuring inspired fashion that combines eclectic prints, flattering shapes and fresh designs. Update your wardrobe with pieces you'll wear again and again.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories Sale
channel.desc: Presenting a spectacular selection of gorgeous shoes, handbags and many more accessories from brands you'll adore, all at unbelievable prices.

channel.title: Best of QVC Style

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Richard Jackson's Garden
channel.desc: Join our resident expert Richard Jackson as he shares his top tips for the coming season, with exciting new plant varieties alongside classic blooms and shrubs.

channel.title: Handbags Sale
